articles.title: Lamborghini may ditch its first fully electric car altogether
articles.author: Alborz Fallah
articles.summary: Lamborghini plans to launch its fourth series-production model, based on the Lanzador concept, as a plug-in hybrid in 2029. This deviates from the initial plan to launch it as a fully electric vehicle.

articles.title: German-made Fissler cookware is up to 25% off at this premium sale üç≥
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Fissler, a German cookware brand, is offering up to 25% off on its high-end cookware during a back-to-school sale. The sale includes discounts on items like the Fissler Pure Collection Stainless Steel 9-Piece Cookware Set, serving pans, and frying pans.

articles.title: Google Drive Video Playback Gains YouTube-Inspired Controls
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Google Drive is introducing a new video playback enhancement that allows users to rewind videos using a preview function, similar to YouTube. This feature is available to all Google account holders and provides visual thumbnails when hovering over the progress bar to quickly locate specific moments in a video. While the preview is visible in the mobile app, the rewind function using this preview is currently limited to the web version.

articles.title: India's Dr Reddy's plans to launch generic obesity drugs in 87 countries next year, CEO says
articles.author: News India Times
articles.summary: Dr. Reddy's Laboratories plans to launch a cheaper copycat version of Novo Nordisk's Wegovy. The U.S. and European markets will open later, with other Western markets opening between 2029 and 2033.

articles.title: Consumer NZ rates three laundry detergents as effective as water in stain removal test
articles.author: Tom Rose
articles.summary: Consumer NZ conducted a product review of 46 laundry soaps to evaluate their efficacy. The review revealed that at least three products performed no better than washing with water. Persil products were identified as the most effective in stain removal.

articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: GoSearches promotes 'Gazebo' with a call to action 'See Now,' suggesting a new product launch related to outdoor structures.

articles.title: The best Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 cases
articles.author: Kyle Wilson
articles.summary: Samsung is launching a clear case for the Galaxy Z Fold 7 with a minimalistic design. TORRAS is introducing the Magnetic Shockproof case for the Galaxy Z Fold 7, which provides MagSafe compatibility and includes an S Pen holder.

articles.title: Consumer NZ Reveals The Best And Worst Laundry Detergents
articles.author: Scoop
articles.summary: Shotz Laundry Liquid and EcoLiving Laundry Detergent Sheets with lavender scent received an overall score of 27 out of 100 in testing. This score is equivalent to washing with only water, indicating poor performance for these detergent products.

articles.title: FRB„Éë„Ç¶„Ç®„É´Ë≠∞Èï∑„Åå8„ÅãÊúàÂæå„Å´ÈÄÄ‰ªª„Å∏Ôºù„Éà„É©„É≥„ÉóÂ§ßÁµ±È†ò
articles.summary: Fantasy Enterprises has launched its new premium brand, Meyvin, along with its official e-commerce platform, www.meyvin.in. Meyvin offers high-end backpacks, laptop bags, sling bags, and everyday carry essentials, targeting affluent consumers and business professionals.

articles.title: Kato Living - Soak it All in With Minnesota Hot Tubs Mankato
articles.summary: Minnesota Hot Tubs offers new and exciting products.

articles.title: Kato Living - Discounts Galore with D&B Discounts
articles.summary: A new Mankato store is offering a 50% discount on various products. The store is likely promoting a new product line or launch event.

articles.title: This Ninja Thirsti bundle has everything you need to make perfect drinks at home for less than $200
articles.author: Cailey Lindberg
articles.summary: Ninja is offering a Personalize Your Thirsti Bundle for $180, which includes the Thirsti machine, four flavors, and a CO2 canister. The machine creates still and sparkling drinks with customizable options. Bed Bath & Beyond has the Margaritaville Key West Frozen Concoction Maker retailing for $420, featuring pre-programmed drink settings and ice shaving capabilities.

articles.title: Elevate Mealtime with New Tyson¬Æ Simple Ingredient Nuggets  Jul. 23, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: Tyson Foods has launched Tyson Simple Ingredient Nuggets, catering to consumers seeking simplified labels and high protein. The nuggets are made with all-natural white meat chicken, mozzarella, parmesan cheeses, and savory seasonings and contain 23 grams of protein per serving. The product is available in Original flavor now and Spicy launching soon.

articles.title: One Returning Character in Pokemon Legends: Z-A Has Come a Long Way Since X and Y
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon Legends: Z-A was showcased with a fresh trailer during the Pokemon Presents event. This trailer offered players a new look into Lumiose City, highlighting the introduction of this new Pokemon game.

articles.title: Amaze Introduces First Beauty Brand on Teespring Marketplace with Nutrius Partnership  Jul. 23, 2025 20:30
articles.summary: Amaze Holdings, Inc. has partnered with Nutrius to launch beauty products on its Teespring Marketplace, marking the expansion beyond custom merchandise. Nutrius is introducing hydrating skincare and wellness products, including body mists, body butter creams, and supplements, to the marketplace's visitors.

articles.title: AI Transforming the POD Industry: Innovations and Opportunities
articles.author: Square Signs
articles.summary: Square Signs is integrating AI advancements into its web-to-print platform. New AI-powered tools enhance design efficiency, quality control, and personalization through features like automated image enhancement, background removal, AI-based image generation, and quality control automation. Real customer feedback highlights Square Signs' intuitive user interface, extensive customization capabilities, reliable AI-driven quality control, and rapid turnaround.

articles.title: Westville's Pop Up Market open for business
articles.author: Richard Mackenzie
articles.summary: The Town of Westville launched its Pop Up Market, introducing five new businesses to Main Street: Bronc and Burn Western Ware (wood-burning art and jewelry), Sweet & Sudsy Co., Westville Tech Haven, Relish Handcrafts, and Karrie's Hearts and Hummingbirds (various products, including items from other local businesses). Bronc and Burn also offers cotton candy, and Karrie's Hearts and Hummingbirds also sells other people's products.

articles.title: Google just inadvertently leaked the full Pixel 10 lineup
articles.author: Karandeep Singh Oberoi
articles.summary: Google accidentally leaked its entire Pixel 10 series lineup, including the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and a base Pixel 10 model. The leak reveals the designs, with the Pixel 10 Pro models in Moonstone and the base Pixel 10 in Indigo, and confirms a rear telephoto lens for the base model. Google will also offer a $50 off deal for new Pixel 10 purchases from the Google Store with an October 13th deadline.

articles.title: A fresh taste of whisky culture as Johnnie Walker Blonde lands in Lagos
articles.author: Pulse Mix
articles.summary: Johnnie Walker launched Johnnie Walker Blonde, a lighter, subtly sweet Scotch whisky, in Nigeria. It is designed for a new generation of drinkers and is intended to be mixed, often with lemonade. The launch was celebrated at Island BlockParty in Lagos.

articles.title: I tested the Star Wars droid that carries things for you.
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: Piaggio launched the G1T4-M1N1 ('Gita Mini'), an officially licensed Star Wars bot. This bot is designed to follow users, avoid pedestrians, carry up to 20 pounds of cargo, and play The Imperial March. The bot is priced at $2,875.

articles.title: Grok has an AI chatbot for young kids. I used it to try to understand why.
articles.author: Katie Notopoulos
articles.summary: xAI has launched "Rudi," a new AI chatbot designed for children ages 3-6, accessible through the Grok AI app. Rudi, presented as a red panda, initiates conversations as "Story Buddy" and creates kid-friendly stories. The chatbot is an early version and still under development, with some performance issues reported.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Dish Wash Wipes (BRK-4161)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor has developed DISH WASH WIPES, a new product designed for cleaning dishes without a sink or water. InventHelp is offering the product for licensing or sale to manufacturers and marketers. The wipes are designed to be disposable, portable, and easy to use, targeting outdoor enthusiasts, travelers, and households.

articles.title: Centric Software Sets Retail Innovation Benchmark with Updates to Centric PLM‚Ñ¢
articles.author: Centric Software
articles.summary: Centric Software launched Centric PLM‚Ñ¢ 8.0, the latest version of its Product Lifecycle Management platform. This release introduces new features aimed at improving speed, simplicity, and innovation for managing product lifecycles in industries like retail, fashion, and footwear. The platform's features are designed to disrupt outdated workflows and improve supplier collaboration.

articles.title: Mission Foods Launches New Gluten-Free Chickpea Tortillas
articles.author: The Facts
articles.summary: The Company is introducing a new plant-based product designed to deliver substantial flavor. This innovation aims to enhance every bite.

articles.title: To Beat AI Squeeze, Newsweek Building Revenue Beyond Traffic
articles.author: Jessica Davies
articles.summary: Newsweek is launching more subscription products. This action is part of their strategy to expand non-advertising revenue streams, anticipating a future impacted by AI answer engines.

articles.title: These 35 Gorgeous, Practical Products Are Unexpectedly Quite Affordable, Too
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of new products including retractable high-end gel pens, limited edition wildflower Band-Aids, a 14-ounce Stanley Cup, and a lightweight quilted reversible jacket. Additional products include Swedish dishcloths, Baccarat Rouge 540-inspired body wash, UPF 50 sun hat, retro-style sunglasses, a guided journal, a magnetized dry-erase board, hair-tie bracelets, chamomile lavender hand sanitizer, satin pillowcases, silky soft faux tulips, a hummingbird lamp, ceramic ramekins, satin PJs, a pink dish drying rack, flower petal dessert glasses, and an Anthropologie-inspired throw blanket. Furthermore, the article features kitchen shears, a floral dish drying mat, wide-leg yoga pants, wireless over-the-ear headphones, a checkered cutting board, ballet flats, a laptop tote bag, a coffee syrup dispenser set, a vintage-inspired area rug, a secret storage coffee table book, a structured toiletry organizer, a Nine West watch, a crystal martini shaker and a minimalist-inspired salt cellar.

articles.title: Lovart Launches Globally: End-to-End Design Agent Exits Beta, Powered by the World's First AI Creative Reasoning Engine
articles.summary: Lovart has launched its AI design and branding platform after a beta phase with 800,000 users. The platform aims to generate branding and advertising campaigns using AI, offering a cost-effective solution compared to traditional methods. Lovart provides various features such as ChatCanvas, multi-agent co-creation, and autonomous design intelligence, with pricing plans including a free tier and paid subscriptions.

articles.title: Nike's ‚ÄòBest Shoes in the World' Air Max Sneakers Are on Sale for as Low ...
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Nike Air Max sneakers are currently being promoted, with the suggestion that now is an opportune time to purchase them.

articles.title: Lovart Launches Globally: End-to-End Design Agent Exits Beta, Powered by the World's First AI Creative Reasoning Engine
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Lovart has launched its generative design platform, aiming to create high-value branding and advertising campaigns from a single text prompt. The platform targets in-house brands and boutique agencies, enabling them to produce agency-quality branding.

articles.title: Lovart Launches Globally: End-to-End Design Agent Exits Beta, Powered by the World's First AI Creative Reasoning Engine
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Lovart launched its AI design and branding platform called "Design Agent" after a beta testing phase. The platform generates branding and advertising campaigns from text prompts, offering features like ChatCanvas, multi-agent co-creation, and autonomous design intelligence. This platform is designed to provide agency-quality assets and streamline creative workflows.

articles.title: Rinse, Repeat, Rejoice: SouthCoast Gets Free Laundry Day This Sunday
articles.author: Gazelle Gazelle Published:
articles.summary: Dash Laundromat is celebrating the soft opening of its second and largest location in New Bedford. The new laundromat features four 100-pound washers, eight 80-pound washers, free Wi-Fi, 85-inch TVs, and TouchTunes.

articles.title: Best vibrators, tested by an expert to help you climax
articles.author: Emilie Lavinia
articles.summary: Lovehoney's expert Annabelle Knight suggests considering personal preferences when choosing a sex toy. The review highlights the importance of body-safe materials, varied speeds, sustainability, extra features, noise level, and ease of use. The Oh Collective chi is mentioned as a good option, among other evaluated vibrators.

articles.title: Dr Reddy's plans to launch generic of Novo's weight-loss drug next year, CEO says
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Dr. Reddy's Laboratories plans to introduce a cost-effective generic alternative to Novo Nordisk's popular drug. This launch aims to provide a more affordable option in the market.

articles.title: This On-Sale $8 Shower Doo-Dad Has Given Me The Cleanest Hair Of My Life
articles.author: Haley Zovickian
articles.summary: A shampoo scrubber and scalp massager is highlighted for its ability to cleanse grease, buildup, and flakes from the scalp. The product features silicone bristles for gentle exfoliation and improved blood flow. It is available on Amazon in multiple colors and a kid-friendly version is also available.

articles.title: Sipz with a Twist now open in Noblesville
articles.author: Current Publishing
articles.summary: Sunny Singh and Shoaib Shah launched Sipz with a Twist, a soda shop offering smoothies, milkshakes, and customized sodas, inside an Exxon gas station in Noblesville. The shop features 24 signature sodas and 8 organic smoothies, with the Almond Date Delight Smoothie and Fantastica being popular choices. A grand opening celebration is scheduled for July 19.

articles.title: FlutterFlow Introduces a Smarter Dreamflow: AI-First with Tri-Surface Development
articles.author: Flutter Flow Inc
articles.summary: FlutterFlow announced the next evolution of Dreamflow. Dreamflow is an AI-powered development environment. It merges tooling, AI, and developer control into a platform.

articles.title: The best coverless duvets to save you a chore and keep dust mites at bay
articles.author: Ellis Cochrane
articles.summary: The article presents an overview of new coverless duvets from brands such as Night Lark, Slumberdown, So'Home, Next, George at Asda, Dunelm, and Silentnight. These duvets come in various sizes, togs, and designs, with features like hypoallergenic materials, reversible designs, and special considerations for kids and teens. The review also covers washability, material quality, and suitability for different seasons.

articles.title: Did the T3 Airebrush Blow Dry Brush just replace my Dyson Airwrap? Find out here
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: T3 Airebrush Blow Dry Brush, utilizing IonFlow Technology with an ion generator and smart microchip, launched as a tool for smooth, shiny, frizz-free hair. It is introduced as a more affordable alternative to the Dyson Airwrap. The T3 Airebrush is available for under $100 during the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale.

articles.title: MelroseINC Unveils AWS Cloud Storage Performance Results for Video Editing Workflows
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: MelroseINC tested Avid NEXIS Cloud Storage in AWS against two competitors in post-production scenarios. The test revealed that Avid NEXIS Cloud Storage in AWS delivered best-in-class performance and automation, significantly reducing job times. The solution emerged as the top performer in rendering and proxy file creation, completing proxy generation faster than the competitors.

articles.title: 7 Hairstyles That Make Nigerian Men Look Younger
articles.summary: The article highlights several hairstyle trends for men in Nigeria, including Twist Sponge Curls, and recommends products like curl cream from Nectar Beauty Hub (‚Ç¶11,400) and leave-in conditioner from TOS Nigeria (‚Ç¶7,600) to achieve these styles. These styles are marketed as a way to appear more youthful and current.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch8: The ‚Äòfirst smartwatch' with Google Gemini out-of-the-box, and why it matters
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Samsung introduced its new Galaxy Z Fold7, Galaxy Z Flip7, and Galaxy Z Flip7 FE foldable smartphones at the Galaxy Unpacked event. The company also launched the Galaxy Watch8 smartwatch.

articles.title: River City Refillery now offering all-natural products New Braunfels
articles.author: Andrew Creelman
articles.summary: River City Refillery sells bar soap.

articles.title: The Glenlivet reintroduces its legacy to Nigeria with an exclusive ambassador dinner and a renewed statement of purpose
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: The Glenlivet reintroduced its single malt Scotch whisky in Nigeria, signaling a new standard in the market. The company hosted an exclusive ambassador dinner to mark the occasion and reaffirm its commitment to the region.

articles.summary: Huayang Group has globally launched mass production of its VPD (Virtual Panoramic Display) product. This product utilizes the company's technological advantages in screen display and HUD optical display. The VPD product offers flexible configuration options based on customer needs.

articles.title: JSW MG Motor sets up MG SELECT Experience Centre in Chennai
articles.summary: JSW MG Motor India has launched its first MG SELECT experience center in Chennai, aiming to expand its presence across 13 cities with 14 facilities. This center, built on the 'Reimagining Luxury' concept, will offer personalized services and showcase products like the MG Cyberster and MG M9 Presidential Limousine.

articles.title: Zenzap Gains Traction as Top Alternative to Slack for Frontline and Deskless Teams
articles.summary: Zenzap has launched a mobile-first communication platform tailored for frontline and deskless teams, integrating chat, tasks, and file management into one app. It offers features like task assignment, organized conversations, easy onboarding/offboarding, work hour definition, and integrations with other tools, aiming to provide structure and security for businesses.

articles.title: Aldi's sell-out air fryer to hit shelves
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: Aldi has re-launched its kitchen essentials range, featuring the Dual Zone Air Fryer priced at ¬£59.99 and the High-Speed Blending Set at ¬£14.99. The range includes various kitchen gadgets and will be available in Aldi stores across the UK from July 31.

articles.title: Mazda CX-5: Anticipating the Next Generation
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: Mazda Southern Africa is planning to launch the next-generation Mazda CX-5 in South Africa in the second half of 2026, featuring a 2.5L petrol engine. The company is also offering flexible finance options through Mazda Assured for the current CX-5, allowing customers to upgrade to the new generation when it becomes available.

articles.title: Freshworks joins as official partner of McLaren Formula 1 team
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Freshworks is integrating Freshservice.

articles.title: Time is running out to save on the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7
articles.author: Cameron Faulkner
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 on July 25th. Pre-ordering offers benefits like a free upgrade to the 512GB version and better trade-in values. The Z Fold 7 costs $1,999.99 without trade-in or carrier promotions and features an 8-inch inner screen.

articles.title: Newsweek New & Noteworthy: Products You Need to Try (Jul 23, 2025)
articles.author: Adam Mills
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new products. Premier Protein introduced AlmondMilk Non-Dairy Protein Shakes, and Catalina Crunch released Protein Granola. Icelandic Provisions expanded its Extra Creamy line with Salted Caramel & Banana Skyr. Procter & Gamble launched Gemz, a new line of water-activated single-dose solid shampoos and conditioners and Dr. Praeger's launched Pizza Stars.

articles.title: Sun-Sational Summer Must-Haves
articles.author: Bryanna Imel
articles.summary: Olay has launched its Summer Fizz Body Wash Collection for $9.99 and Secret Clinical Fizz Collection for $8.99, available at retailers nationwide. ShowerSpecs are now available for $69.99 at showerspecs.com, and XOMD offers Throuple & Conversation + Connection Cards for $391 at xomdskin.com.

articles.title: Will the ONVO L90's Fast Market Entry Boost NIO's Competitive Edge?
articles.author: Lavina Shahu
articles.summary: NIO's ONVO sub-brand has started test drives for its L90 electric SUV in China, with an official launch date set for July 31 and pre-sales beginning July 10, 2025, and deliveries starting August 1, 2025. Li Auto will unveil its Li i8 electric SUV on July 29, having initiated pre-sales on July 17. XPeng launched its G7 model, featuring the Turing AI smart driving chip, with a starting price of RMB 195,800.

articles.title: The top dry shampoo powders for healthy hair
articles.author: Sabrina Smelko
articles.summary: Crown Affair offers dry shampoo with or without a kabuki brush, featuring Japanese persimmon, bergamot, yuzu, and lemongrass. Voir offers a micro-powder spray dry shampoo with wildberry, kakadu plum, and green tea extract, using a unique pump sprayer. The Allure's Best of Beauty Award winner dry shampoo contains black ginseng and biotin which can stimulate hair follicles and promote hair growth.

articles.title: The top dry shampoo powders for healthy hair
articles.author: Sabrina Smelko
articles.summary: The article reviews several new dry shampoo products, including dae Fairy Duster Volumizing Dry Shampoo Powder featuring Mojave yucca and prickly pear seed oil, Crown Affair The Dry Shampoo with Japanese persimmon, and Kristin Ess Fragrance-Free Shampoo Powder using neem leaf extract. Other featured products include Voir Haircare She's Like the Wind Invisible Dry Shampoo & Conditioner, I DEW CARE Tap Secret Mattifying Dry Shampoo Powder with black ginseng, Prose Custom Dry Shampoo offering personalized formulas, and K18 AirWash Dry Shampoo designed for colored hair.

articles.title: The top dry shampoo powders for healthy hair
articles.author: Sabrina Smelko
articles.summary: Dae's dry shampoo powder, containing Mojave yucca and prickly pear seed oil, combats greasy hair and adds volume. Prose offers custom-blended dry shampoo tailored to individual hair needs. K18 AirWash Dry Shampoo is clinically proven to eliminate odor and reduce oil, suitable for colored hair.

articles.title: Samsung unveils new premium experience store in Mumbai
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched a new Premium Experience Store in Andheri West, Mumbai, showcasing its latest innovations in mobile, wearables, and smart home technology, including Galaxy devices and the SmartThings ecosystem. The store also features a service center and offers workshops as part of Samsung's 'Learn @ Samsung' initiative, along with exclusive Paytm First benefits for customers.

articles.title: Shoppers can expect major change to 300 Morrisons stores over the next year
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Morrisons has launched a new photo printing service that allows customers to print photos and create personalized items such as magnets, coasters, and phone cases. The service includes online ordering with home delivery and photo printing kiosks being installed in 300 supermarkets.

articles.title: Are electronic locks the key to safe homes?
articles.summary: Godrej launched the Advantis IoT9, a smart lock with multiple access modes including fingerprint, numeric pin, and smartphone unlocking. This made-in-India product integrates with Alexa and Google Home and offers features like temporary access, an anti-prank alarm, and break-in alerts, aiming to provide enhanced home security.

articles.title: Vivo X200 FE Review: The Compact Flagship Done Right
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: Vivo has introduced the X200 FE smartphone, priced at Rs 54,999, featuring a compact design, Snapdragon chipset, 120Hz AMOLED display, and a 6,500 mAh battery with 80W fast charging. The phone also boasts a versatile camera setup with a 50-megapixel Sony IMX921 sensor and ZEISS-tuned optics. It competes with devices like the OnePlus 13s and offers flagship-level features in a pocketable frame.

articles.title: GMA Deals: Save Big & Steal These Finds
articles.summary: NuFACE offers microcurrent devices such as MINI+ and Trinity+ starter kits designed for at-home treatments. Caliray, founded by Urban Decay's visionary, provides clean makeup like volumizing tubing mascara and serum color corrector. Other brands discussed are Nƒìmah with skincare solutions, Persona Cosmetics with fragrance-free makeup, and Salute Sant√©! offering grapeseed oils.

articles.title: Coca-Cola to release new Trump-approved version of the soda
articles.author: Steve Charnock
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is launching a new cane sugar-sweetened version of its signature drink in the US, set to launch this fall. This new product is designed to complement the company's existing corn syrup-based line-up, offering consumers an additional choice. The company hopes this domestic cane sugar product will reach more shoppers who want the 'Mexican Coke' taste without the higher import price tag.

articles.title: Video: Melihat Pameran Food & Hospitality Indonesia 2025
articles.author: Anisa Hafifah
articles.summary: A new elegant restaurant has opened, featuring a menu that includes Barramundi and Nasi Campur Manado.

articles.title: NTT DATA Named an Emerging Leader in the Emerging Market Quadrant of the 2025 Gartner¬Æ Innovation Guide for Generative AI Consulting and Implementation Services
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NTT DATA has been recognized as an Emerging Leader in the Emerging Market Quadrant of the 2025 Gartner Innovation Guide for Generative AI Consulting and Implementation Services. This recognition is based on criteria including market understanding, innovation, products, services, and viability in the emerging market.

articles.title: New Look's 'perfect' ¬£36 summer dress in 5 colours slashed by 69%
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: New Look is offering the Broderie Anglaise Mini Dress, now priced at ¬£11-¬£26.99, and Faux Leather Cut Out Interwoven Strap Sandals, priced at ¬£11.99-¬£15.99. Additionally, Nobody's Child features the Long Sleeve Shanice Mini Dress, reduced to ¬£48-¬£55, while ASOS retails the Stradivarius Mini Dress With Embroidery for ¬£35.99.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Pok√©mon Legends bundle releases October 16
articles.author: Vic Hood
articles.summary: Nintendo is releasing a new Switch 2 bundle on October 16, which includes the Nintendo Switch 2 console and the Switch 2 edition of Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A. The bundle is available for pre-order from My Nintendo Store and select retailers for $499.9/¬£429.99.

articles.title: Pokemon Champions - Official Overview Trailer
articles.author: Gamespot
articles.summary: Pok√©mon Champions is introducing new features. These features are updates to the existing platform.

articles.title: Bill Gates joins his daughter Phoebe's startup-- And it's a wonderful lesson in leadership, here's why
articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.summary: Bill Gates is working a shift in customer service at his daughter's startup, Phia, which is co-founded by Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni. Phia is an AI platform and browser extension designed to help users find the best prices for new and secondhand high-end fashion products across 40,000 websites.

articles.title: The ‚ÄòDoorbell of Dreams' is coming to Brighton
articles.author: Caitlin Marsh
articles.summary: Virgin StartUp and HelpBnk are touring their 'Doorbell of Dreams' initiative, allowing entrepreneurs to pitch business ideas via video doorbell. The best pitches will receive feedback from entrepreneurs like Richard Branson and Simon Squibb on social media, potentially reaching a global audience. The 'Doorbell of Dreams' event is offering free business advisor chats from Virgin StartUp.

articles.title: Candy Lips Launches a Bold Line of New Sodas Inspired by Your Favorite Childhood Treats
articles.author: Candy Lips
articles.summary: Candy Lips, a new beverage company, is launching a line of five candy-inspired soda flavors: Peach Rings, Cotton Candy, Bubble Gum, Sour Gummy Worm, and Watermelon Gummy Slices. This launch embraces the "newstalgic" trend and aims to provide a fizzy alternative to traditional gut health beverages.

articles.title: Amaze Introduces First Beauty Brand on Teespring Marketplace with Nutrius Partnership
articles.author: Amaze Holdings
articles.summary: Amaze Holdings, Inc. launched beauty products on its Teespring Marketplace for the first time through a partnership with Nutrius. Nutrius introduced hydrating skincare and wellness products, including body mists, body butter creams, and a hair, nail and skin supplement, to the marketplace.

articles.title: Lipton Doubles Down on Tea Innovation With First-Ever Concentrates and New Fruit & Herbal Line
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Lipton is launching two new product lines: Tea Concentrates, available in three flavors exclusively at Walmart this July, and Fruit & Herbal Teas, launching nationally in August with four flavors. The Tea Concentrates offer a convenient iced tea experience, while the Fruit & Herbal Teas target consumers seeking comforting and flavorful caffeine-free options.

articles.title: Next's 'classy' polka dot dress is perfect for weddings - and it has pockets
articles.author: Ruairi Scott Byrne
articles.summary: Next's 'Love and Roses Black/White Polka Dot Midi Dress', retailing at ‚Ç¨84 and available in sizes eight to 22, is receiving overwhelmingly positive reviews from customers, boasting a 4.8 out of five rating on Next's website. Customers are praising the dress's style, comfort, and quality, specifically for wedding events.

articles.title: New whisky bottling venture close to home of golf has ‚Äòboutique' distillery in sights
articles.author: Scott Reid
articles.summary: Patron Saint, a new whisky bottling venture, plans expansion including a boutique distillery near St Andrews. The company's first collaboration is as the official supplier for the British and Irish Lions tour to Australia. Patron Saint aims to offer a unique whisky visitor experience with exclusive access and guided tastings.

articles.title: How International Flower Delivery Works: From Order To Delivery
articles.summary: International flower delivery services like MyGlobalFlowers, FTD, and Interflora offer a variety of floral arrangements for different occasions. These companies collaborate with local florists in the destination country to prepare and deliver fresh flowers, often providing options for personalized notes and delivery date selection. They also offer notification systems and photo confirmation of delivery to ensure customer satisfaction.

articles.title: National Janitorial and Sanitation Distributor Selects HawkSearch to Power Adobe Commerce Experience
articles.summary: Bridgeline Digital has announced a new HawkSearch engagement with a national distributor to power personalized search experiences on its Adobe Commerce site. The HawkSearch implementation will integrate directly with Adobe Commerce, featuring real-time indexing, dynamic filtering, and AI-driven product recommendations for B2B and B2C audiences.

articles.title: [REVIEW] Why Samsung The Galaxy Z Fold7 Feels Like A Laptop‚Ä¶ But Better
articles.author: Syazwan Bahri
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, featuring a thinner design, an 8-inch main display, and a 200MP main camera inherited from the S25 Ultra. Pre-orders are live until July 31st, with general availability starting August 1st. Prices range from RM7,799 for the 256GB version to RM9,899 for the 1TB version.

articles.title: New M&S ¬£40 floral dress 'straight out of fairy tale' is 'perfect for summer'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer has launched the Lyocell Rich Floral V-Neck Mini Waisted Dress, priced at ¬£39.50. The dress features a soft floral print, v-neckline, tiered skirt, and is available in sizes 6-24, with petite, regular, and tall fits.

articles.title: LG unveils enterprise AI model EXAONE at 1/10 the cost of ChatGPT
articles.author: ÌôçÎ™ÖÏàò Ïù∏ÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ìä∏
articles.summary: LG AI Research has launched its large language model (LLM), EXAONE, for external use, including a beta version of its chatbot 'Chat EXAONE' and an API service for enterprise developers. They also unveiled EXAONE Data Foundry, and the new multimodal AI model EXAONE 4.0 VL.

articles.title: [Hansung University Campus Town Startups 2025] 'POSR ', a startup operating a street brand inspired by vintage culture
articles.author: Îß§Í±∞ÏßÑÌïúÍ≤Ω
articles.summary: POSR, led by CEOs Yun Sung Jin and Kim Min Tae, possesses a competitive advantage through its product planning capabilities. These capabilities incorporate cultural context and stories into clothing designs, reinterpreting symbols, language, and attitudes in a modern way.

articles.title: Samsung shoppers rush for ¬£200 price cut on Galaxy Z Fold7 days before release
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the new Z Fold7 and Flip7, with pre-orders including benefits like double storage. Samsung has introduced the Galaxy Club plan allowing payments over 24 months, along with discounts and Samsung Care+ benefits for the new phone.

articles.title: This $7 Old School Powder Perfects My Skin Better Than Luxury Formulas
articles.author: Tessa Flores
articles.summary: Coty Airspun loose powder features an updated talc-free formula harkening back to 1935, providing a silky soft veil for the skin, blurring imperfections, and absorbing excess oil. The powder manages to secure cream and liquid foundations and is available in three shades, including translucent and an extra-coverage option.

articles.title: Work starts on Alsager's Starbucks drive-thru near the new Sainsbury's superstore
articles.author: The Editor
articles.summary: Starbucks has started construction on a new drive-thru location in Alsager near a Sainsbury's superstore. The opening hours are expected to be from 6 am to 11 pm, consistent with the Sainsbury's store hours. The drive-thru is located on the former Twyford Bathrooms site off Linley Lane.

articles.title: American specialty chemicals firm Lubrizol expands in Singapore with launch of innovation centre
articles.summary: Lubrizol Corporation launched its new South-east Asia Innovation Centre in Singapore on July 23. The new center features immersive experience zones, virtual reality display, and dedicated spaces for technical training and knowledge sharing, which will allow scientists and product developers to design and test solutions for customers across various industries.

articles.title: Cubot KingKong Power 5 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Cubot officially announced the KingKong Power 5 in April 2025, a rugged smartphone featuring a 15300 mAh battery with 33W wired charging. The smartphone includes 6GB RAM, 128GB internal storage, a dual-camera setup with a 64-megapixel wide lens, and operates on Android 15.

articles.title: Akash Alankar's Budbee is set to disrupt the AV and electronics market in India
articles.author: Focus
articles.summary: Budbee.in, a new marketplace for high-quality audio-visual and electronic products, is launching on October 1, 2025, offering certified pre-owned and new AV products from brands like Polk, Denon, and Marantz. Budbee.in also has strategic tie-ups with laptop giants such as Acer, Dell, and Lenovo.

articles.title: China's tech talent are making big strides ‚Äî they're creating apps for the world
articles.author: NBCPhiladelphia
articles.summary: Lovart, a new AI design tool co-founded by the former China head of CapCut, officially launched on Wednesday. The startup, based in San Francisco, anticipates surpassing 1 million users within a week of its launch. Lovart utilizes Anthropic's Claude 4 and OpenAI models.

articles.title: 37 Amazon Hidden Gems That'll Make You Think 'Where Have You Been All My Life?'
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Lip Smacker launched Rolly Lip Gloss with four fruity flavors. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder for matte skin with blue hyaluronic acid. Eos released a limited edition Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment containing cocoa, shea, and avocado butters. Moroccanoil is offering a Mini Must-Haves Sampler with travel-sized versions of their best products.

articles.title: A Cordless Vacuum That Shoppers Prefer to Dyson Is $90 at Amazon
articles.author: Isabel Garcia
articles.summary: Trucozie Cordless Vacuum is now available on Amazon with a deal and a stackable coupon, bringing the price down to $90. It features three suction modes, LED headlights, a five-stage filtration system with a HEPA filter, and converts into a handheld vacuum with attachments. The vacuum can run for up to 45 minutes on a full charge.

articles.title: Ex-Twinings buyer launches new-to-market Albion Tea brand
articles.author: James Beeson
articles.summary: Angela Pryce, a former tea buyer, has launched Albion Tea, a new loose leaf tea brand featuring varieties like Bourne Valley Breakfast and Earl Grey with English Lavender. The brand, available via DTC from ¬£9/100g, sources teas directly from growers and emphasizes sustainability. Additionally, Teapigs' founders launched Spill, a new everyday tea brand.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: A Refined Folding Experience
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a new foldable phone with a refined design, including an improved Ultra Thin Glass (UTG) for enhanced scratch resistance and a reduced crease. It features the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, a versatile camera system, and software enhancements for productivity, with an expected launch in August 2025 and a starting price of $1799.

articles.title: EE expands 5G standalone ‚Äì is your phone already ready for it?
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: EE has launched its 5G Standalone network, expanding coverage to over 34 million people by the end of August and aiming to reach over 41 million by spring 2026. This service delivers faster uploads, smoother video calls, and better gaming responsiveness and is compatible with many smartphones from brands like Apple, Samsung and Google. New and upgrading customers on any EE pay monthly handset plan get access automatically.

articles.title: Lovart Launches Globally: End-to-End Design Agent Exits Beta, Powered by the World's First AI Creative Reasoning Engine
articles.author: Lovart
articles.summary: Lovart launched its AI design and branding Agent after a Beta testing phase. The platform aims to generate branding and advertising campaigns from a single text prompt and offers services for under US$90 per month.

articles.title: Lovart Launches Globally: End-to-End Design Agent Exits Beta, Powered by the World's First AI Creative Reasoning Engine
articles.summary: Lovart launched its AI design and branding agent platform after a Beta period, offering branding and advertising campaign capabilities. Nvidia is planning to deploy SOCAMM modules in its next-generation AI products including their AI PC Digits, with Micron securing the initial production approval.

articles.title: Tesco F&F ¬£36 dress 'looks more expensive than the price tag'
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Tesco F&F introduced the F&F Chiffon Ruffle Boho Midi Dress in Pink, priced at ¬£36 and available in sizes 6 to 22. The dress features a tie neckline, ruffle accents, and a crinkle chiffon fabric. Similar dresses are available from New Look and Monsoon.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Pok√©mon Legends Z-A Bundle announced with the return of Mega Evolutions: Release date, price and upgrades revealed
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the Nintendo Switch 2 and Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A bundle on October 16, 2025, for $499.99. The Nintendo Switch 2 features upgraded specs, including a 7.9-inch 1080p HDR display, magnetic Joy-Con 2 controllers, 4K docked output, and 256 GB internal storage, while Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A brings back the Kalos region with dynamic environmental shifts between day and night and enhanced visuals.

articles.title: Tecno Spark 40 Series: A stylish revolution for Nigeria's trendsetters
articles.author: BI Africa
articles.summary: TECNO has launched the SPARK 40 Series, featuring the SPARK 40, SPARK 40 Pro, and SPARK 40 Pro+. The series features an ultra-slim design, MediaTek Helio G200 chipset, a 50MP main camera, and a 5200mAh battery with fast and wireless charging capabilities, targeting young, ambitious users.

articles.title: B&M is selling a dupe of powerful Dyson gadget for ¬£450 less ‚Äì it's handheld, easy to store & detects dust automatically
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: B&M is selling the Blaupunkt Powerforce Anti-Tangle 25.9V Vacuum Cleaner, now available for ¬£79, discounted from ¬£99. The vacuum features a digital touch control display, anti-tangle technology, auto dust sensor, lithium ion battery with up to 50 minutes of run time and 28KPA suction power. It's being compared to the Dyson V15 Detect Absolute cordless vacuum.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G launching in India on July 25 for less than Rs 10,000: Details
articles.summary: Lava is launching a new budget smartphone called Lava Blaze Dragon 5G on July 25, priced under Rs 10,000. The device features a 6.74-inch HD+ 120Hz display, Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset, 4GB RAM, 128GB storage, 50MP primary camera, and a 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging, and runs on Android 15.

articles.title: Bill Gates joins his daughter Phoebe's startup-- And it's a wonderful lesson in leadership, here's why
articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.summary: Phoebe Gates, Bill Gates' daughter, and Sophia Kianni co-founded Phia, an AI-powered platform designed to compare prices of new and secondhand high-end products across 40,000 websites. Phia functions as a fashion-tech tool that includes a browser extension to help users shop smarter and more sustainably by finding the best prices, surfacing secondhand options, and showing lower-impact alternatives.

articles.title: You'll Want To High-Five Yourself For Buying These 37 Excellent Products
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Several new products are highlighted, including Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, a 3-in-1 wireless charger for Apple devices, and a hair-building fiber product. Also featured is Wet & Forget weekly shower cleaner and Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel among others. These launches aim to improve various aspects of daily life, from skincare and tech convenience to cleaning efficiency.

articles.title: Best Lip crayons: Top 8 picks that give your lips a gorgeous look and luscious feel
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: The article introduces and describes several lip crayon products from brands like Nudestix, INGLOT, THE BODY SHOP, Diego dalla Palma MILANO, MARS, FACES CANADA, Maybelline New York, and SUGAR. These lip crayons offer features such as matte and satin finishes, long-lasting color, hydrating ingredients, and precise application, catering to diverse preferences and needs.

articles.title: ÁâπÊñØÊãâÊé®Âá∫'Ë∂ÖÂÖÖËΩØÁ≥ñ'Ôºö‰∏âÁßçÂè£Âë≥ÔºåÂîÆ‰ª∑ 35 ÁæéÂÖÉ_ÊâãÊú∫ÁΩëÊòìÁΩë
articles.author: IT‰πãÂÆ∂
articles.summary: Tesla has launched a new food product called 'Supercharged Gummies,' available in three flavors: Cyberberry, Mango Bolt, and Dog Mode Chill. The gummies come in a Tesla lightning bolt-shaped box and are priced at $35, currently available at the new Tesla-themed restaurant in Santa Monica.

articles.title: CNET: Best pressure washers of 2025
articles.author: Cnet
articles.summary: Karcher introduces the K1800PS Cube pressure washer, highlighting its portability, integrated storage, and multiple nozzles. DeWalt launches the 20V MAX 550 PSI Cordless Power Cleaner Kit, emphasizing its power and versatility with multiple nozzles for various cleaning tasks. Also, DeWalt releases the DWPW3000 Max Pressure Washer, designed for large cleaning jobs, featuring high water pressure, portable design, and integrated storage.

articles.title: Free Laundry Day at Dartmouth and New Bedford laundromats. Here's what to know.
articles.author: Faith Harrington
articles.summary: Dash Laundromat is hosting a Free Laundry Day to coincide with the grand opening of their second location in New Bedford on July 27th. This event aims to give back to the community by providing access to over 100 washers and dryers across both locations.

articles.title: Bill Gates says: When your daughter asks if you'd be willing to work a shift in customer service at her startup, the only right answer is ...
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni co-founded Phia, an AI-powered fashion startup which offers price comparison across 40,000 websites for new and second-hand products. Phia is an app and browser extension designed to find the best prices and lower-impact alternatives, aiming to be the 'Booking.com of fashion'.

articles.title: Next's ¬£32 summer dress 'looks expensive' and is 'perfect for holidays'
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Next launched the Mini Shift Dress with Linen, priced at ¬£32 and available in multiple colors and sizes. The dress has received positive customer reviews and a 4.2-star rating. New Look offers the Floral Print V-Neck Mesh Micro Mini Dress for ¬£25.99.

articles.title: Google Search's AI Transformation, Explained
articles.author: Evan Spear
articles.summary: Google introduced 'AI Mode' to its search engine, aiming to provide interactive, AI-boosted search results and detailed, personalized answers. This new feature intends to offer information almost instantaneously, potentially eliminating the need to click on external links. The introduction of AI Mode is part of Google's continuous efforts to enhance user experience, although some users have expressed concerns about the quality of search results.

articles.title: Interpublic introduces Agentic Systems for commerce
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Interpublic Group launched Agentic Systems for Commerce (ASC), a new AI and automation-driven product designed to help brands navigate complex commerce environments. ASC captures detailed data signals on products and competitors, analyzing information such as search behavior, pricing, and inventory to help brands adjust sales strategies. The offering is currently in pilot phase with nearly two dozen consumer goods brands and has shown early success in increasing impressions and sales.

articles.title: Ai+ Nova 5G Sale Will Start Today in India; Check Price, Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Ai+ relaunched its Nova 5G smartphone on Flipkart at a starting price of INR 7,499, including launch offers. The phone features a 6.7-inch HD+ display, 50MP rear camera, 5MP front camera, Android 15, Unisoc T8200 chipset, and a 5,000 mAh battery.

articles.title: Iowa State Fair's Bold New Beverage Lineup Set to Debut
articles.summary: Iowa State Fair is introducing a new drink lineup with both spirited and spirit-free options, including Apple Pie Float, Cotton Candy Soda Pop, Funnel Cake Beer, and Mini Donut Beer. Fairgoers can vote for their favorite new beverage through the Iowa State Fair App from August 7-13.

articles.title: What is dirty soda and where can you try it?
articles.summary: The Fountain, a new soda shop, opened in Clinton, MA, offering a menu of over 40 different "dirty sodas." These sodas include combinations like The Founder (Dr. Pepper with vanilla syrup and coconut creamer) and the Creamy Cola Crush (Coke with sweet cream, raspberry puree, and fresh lime juice).

articles.title: Genis Lamp, a brand that reinterprets the value of Korean alcohol with domestic raw materials, annou..
articles.author: Lee Hojun
articles.summary: Genis Lamp has launched a new product, "IGIN SACOMTONIC," a 4% low-alcohol drink that blends domestic rice, apples, and grapes. It is available at GS25 convenience stores nationwide, official online malls of Genisramp, and brand pop-up stores. The company is also running a "Summer Taste Igin" campaign with BTS Jin as the global ambassador.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7: Unboxing, First Look & Price
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7, featuring an 8-inch main AMOLED display, a 6.5-inch cover screen, and a 200MP camera. Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite and Galaxy AI on Android 16 / One UI 8, the foldable device boasts a thinner, lighter design with Armor Aluminum build and IP48 rating.

articles.title: AR Glasses: Gixel Secures ‚Ç¨5M for Optical Displays
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Gixel is developing a modular architecture for AR displays, designed to be scalable for AI glasses and immersive AR experiences. The technology delivers smartphone-level image quality with excellent transparency, minimizes weight and heat generation, and allows OEMs to customize displays for specific applications. Gixel is preparing developer kits for pilot partnerships and plans a Series A round to scale manufacturing.

articles.title: From AI to quantum: ThatWare's bold leap into the future of SEO
articles.summary: ThatWare is launching Quantum SEO, a new SEO model inspired by quantum mechanics, designed to understand how users interact with content online. This service expands a brand's authority, relevance, and visibility across the web while aligning with search engine algorithms. They are also launching Hyper-intelligent SEO, blending AI with human creativity.

articles.title: This simple makeup brush trick is a total game changer for you skin.
articles.author: Alix Nicholson
articles.summary: Glam Theory offers a range of makeup brushes, including the 3-Piece Quick Trio, featuring a kabuki brush, eyeshadow diffuser brush, and blush/bronzer brush. Their Angled Buffer Brush is designed for liquid, cream, or stick foundation. The Glam Theory Solid Deep Clean Brush Balm is also mentioned as a brush cleanser.

articles.title: Nintendo needs to start showing Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A for the original Switch again
articles.author: Josh Broadwell
articles.summary: Nintendo showcased new footage of 'Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A' specifically for Nintendo Switch 2, revealing gameplay elements like city exploration, team interactions, and battles. The game's improved performance on the new console compared to the original Switch is a key selling point.

articles.title: Samsung Foldable Phones: Continuing Offers and Perks
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Z Flip 7 FE, with the Z Flip 7 featuring an Exynos 2500 processor and 12GB of RAM, while the FE version uses an Exynos 2400 processor and 8GB of RAM and is priced at $899.99. The company also anticipates launching the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Galaxy Z Flip 6 with substantial pre-order bonuses, trade-in values, and potential discounts.

articles.title: Nubank Announces New Nucoin Loyalty Program
articles.author: Bitcoin
articles.summary: Nubank, a neobank in Latam, has launched a new version of its previously abandoned product.

articles.title: Kia highlights spacious design, customizable body of PV5 at tech presentation
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Kia Corp. has unveiled key features of its PV5 purpose-built vehicle.

articles.title: Want a $5,000 laundry room glow-up? Arm & Hammer can help
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Arm & Hammer launched "The Whole Darn Arm," a new campaign promoting their product line. The campaign offers two lucky winners a $5,000 e-gift card for laundry room makeovers. Additionally, 100 winners will receive $75 worth of Arm & Hammer products.

articles.title: Platinum Karaoke unveils concept store at SM Makati
articles.summary: Platinum Karaoke launched its first concept store at SM Makati Cyberzone, showcasing advanced karaoke systems like the Alpha 2, along with portable speakers, wearable audio gear, wireless mics, amplifiers, and soundbars. The concept store features a KTV Room for product trials and immersive sound experiences.

articles.title: The Mini Laptop Revival
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: GPD MICROPC 2 has launched a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo and has remarkably surpassed its initial funding targets. The current pricing for a configuration featuring an intel N250 processor, a generous 16GB of RAM, and a swift 512GB SSD stands at $495. Early backers are poised to be among the first to experience this groundbreaking device in September.

articles.title: Intuit brings agentic AI to the mid-market saving organizations 17 to 20 hours a month
articles.author: Venture Beat
articles.summary: Intuit is addressing mid-market needs by launching a new series of agentic AI experiences.

articles.title: AI For Professional Branding: Do's And Don'ts For Entrepreneurs
articles.author: Erhan Kaya
articles.summary: Zoviz, an AI-powered tool developed by Founder & CEO Erhan Kaya, allows users to create designer-grade logos and complete brand kits in under a minute. This AI tool is making branding more accessible by compressing weeks of manual work into minutes, enabling entrepreneurs to test and refine their brand identity quickly and affordably.

articles.title: A Pok√©mon Legends Z-A Switch 2 bundle is coming October 16, but I'm sad it's ...
articles.author: Games Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch a new Pok√©mon Legends Z-A Switch 2 bundle on October 16. Pre-orders for the handheld bundle will begin on July 23.

articles.title: Upcoming Redmi Smartphone in India With Battery Could Be the Redmi 15 5G
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Xiaomi is teasing the launch of a new Redmi smartphone. The teasers focus on battery life, claiming up to 7.5 hours of standby time on 1 percent charge.

articles.title: Pure Sunfarms Rolls Out New Windowed Packaging
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: A new packaging design features windows, enabling consumers to assess the quality of whole flowers before buying. This innovative approach enhances the purchasing experience by providing visual assurance of the product's quality.

articles.title: Smartphone photography enters a new era with Pura 80 Ultra
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: Huawei is developing a new product or feature aimed at revitalizing the smartphone market, which has recently lacked significant innovation. The product promises to be head-turning and jaw-dropping.

articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty Songbird Figure Revealed [EXCLUSIVE]
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Game Rant revealed a new "Cyberpunk 2077" figure of Songbird.

articles.title: AI video is invading YouTube Shorts and Google Photos starting today
articles.author: Ars Technica
articles.summary: Google is introducing generative AI features to its photo and video products. YouTube is rolling out the first wave of generative AI video for YouTube Shorts. Google Photos is integrating with these new features.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 PokÔøΩmon Legends bundle releases October 16
articles.author: Games Industry
articles.summary: Nintendo will release a new Switch 2 bundle in October. This bundle coincides with the launch of Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A.

articles.title: Mega Dragonite Reveal Has Fans Uber Excited for Pok√©mon Legends Z-A
articles.author: Technowize Magazine
articles.summary: Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A will launch on October 16, 2025. The game features Mega Evolution, where Pok√©mon like Mega Dragonite gain greater power and change appearance by unleashing hidden energy.

articles.title: Walrus Protocol Introduces Quilt Upgrade for NFTs, AI Communications, and Log Storage
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: Walrus is launching Quilt, a new service designed to automate the packaging of small files and reduce storage costs on the SUI network. Quilt will bundle up to 660 objects per batch, offering significant cost reductions for storage. The Quilt API will offer metadata integration and direct file access, targeting applications in AI, event logs, and NFTs.
